articles.title: Google Creates Red Team to Test Attacks Against AI Systems - SecurityWeek
articles.description: Google has created a dedicated AI Red Team tasked with carrying out complex technical attacks on artificial intelligence systems.
articles.content:
Google has created a red team that focuses on artificial intelligence (AI) systems and it has published a report providing an overview of common types of attacks and the lessons learned.
